 Coached and mentored a team of over 50 people, consisting of CXOs and Senior Management, from all their Manufacturing plants in India Identified and executed several Breakthrough (BIP) and Continuous improvement projects (CIP) to help optimize their India Operations and achieve savings of over USD 1 million within a year through Lean Six Sigma tools and processes. SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Led a Strategic Global IT Transformation Program, for a large US client, to Rationalize their Application Portfolio across various departments and achieve a savings of over USD 80 million. It involved phase-wise strategy, program planning and implementation, stakeholder management, sunsetting/decommissioning/migration planning, Data Archival and Restoration for all their applications globally. 
 Helped design and execute a strategic PM excellence training and coaching program for over 150 PMs, to increase savings and revenue from existing projects to the turn of USD 1 million 
 Led an operations excellence initiative across various projects to target and achieve a 5% increase in gross margin from projects resulting in multi-million dollars of savings 
 Worked as a SCRUM Master and handled Product Visioning and Roadmap, Epic/Feature/Story mapping, Backlog prioritization and Estimating, Release and Sprint planning, Stakeholder Management, Risk Management to help implement a proof-of-concept for real-time tracking of Oil shipments 
 Was a Project Manager for several projects in Healthcare, Oil-n-Gas and Engineering domains 
 Worked as a Training head to design and deliver various Technical, Functional and Behavioral trainings leveraging in-house experts, as well as top vendors and external trainers

ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Prashant holds a High Management Level position, as Operations Head Agile Coach at Giveplease. from 02/01/2020 to 05/05/2023. The candidate has a total experience of 3.4 years in this company.

Prashant holds a Mid Management Level position, as Delivery Manager at L&T Infotech. from 02/01/2000 to 10/31/2015. The candidate has a total experience of 15.9 years in this company.

Work Experience

Operations Head (Agile Coach, PMO, HR) 	Giveplease, CoReCo	Feb 2020 till Date
Coached the entire India team (~60 people) and helped them learn and adopt agile models (SCRUM, KANBAN and Scaled Agile) in their product as well as projects (~ 80%) 
As PMO head, helped increased visibility on product development, and, established key processes overall for better project estimation, planning and tracking to increase the predictability of projects and stabilize profitability to = 50%
Helped plan a strategy for HR Recruitment & Retention with help of employee connects and innovative motivational tools
Coached a team of over 20 members, to develop an Enterprise Asset Management product, by adopting several Agile practices to a large extent (~60%) 
Trained and Mentored team of 5 PMs in Microsoft Project and Primavera P6 , to gear them up to handle PMO Services for their international clients

LEAN Coach & TRANSFORMATION Consultant	KINDUZ Consulting & OHA	 May 2016 to Oct 2019
As an Ops head and LEAN Coach for a facility management team in India's western region, I coached all the leaders to execute focused improvement programs to increase customer retention and to increase the profitability of the region by 3% resulting in savings of almost Indian Rupees 0.5 million
Coached and mentored a team of over 50 people, consisting of CXOs and Senior Management, from all their Manufacturing plants in India. Identified and executed several Breakthrough (BIP) and Continuous improvement projects (CIP) to help optimize their India Operations and achieve savings of over USD 1 million within a year through Lean Six Sigma tools and processes. BIP and CIPs were targeted to address business processes, Sales, Training and IT departments
Trained and Mentored several Faculty & Students (freshers) , from over 100 different academic institutions in India, to make them Industry ready. Some modules covered were SDLC, Project management, Agile methodologies, customer service orientation, communication & presentation skills

Program/Delivery Manager	L&T Infotech, India & USA 	Feb 2000 to Oct 2015
Led a Strategic Global IT Transformation Program, for a large US client, to Rationalize their Application Portfolio across various departments and achieve a savings of over USD 80 million. It involved phase-wise strategy, program planning and implementation, stakeholder management, sunsetting/decommissioning/migration planning, Data Archival and Restoration for all their applications globally.
Helped design and execute a strategic PM excellence training and coaching program for over 150 PMs, to increase savings and revenue from existing projects to the turn of USD 1 million
Led an operations excellence initiative across various projects to target and achieve a 5% increase in gross margin from projects resulting in multi-million dollars of savings 
Worked as a SCRUM Master and handled Product Visioning and Roadmap, Epic/Feature/Story mapping, Backlog prioritization and Estimating, Release and Sprint planning, Stakeholder Management, Risk Management to help implement a proof-of-concept for real-time tracking of Oil shipments
Was a Project Manager for several projects in Healthcare, Oil-n-Gas and Engineering domains  
Worked as a Training head to design and deliver various Technical, Functional and Behavioral trainings leveraging in-house experts, as well as top vendors and external trainers

Worked for WALTECH Inc (USA) , AKSHAY Software (India) , BLUESTAR (India) , ASIAN EXPORTS (India)

Industries worked:   Charity (Fintech) , Manufacturing, Information Technology

 

Work Experience

 

Operations Head (Agile Coach, PMO, HR) Giveplease, CoReCoFeb 2020 till Date

  • Coached the entire India team (~60 people) and helped them learn and adopt agile models (SCRUM, KANBAN and Scaled Agile) in their product as well as projects (~ 80%)
  • As PMO head, helped increased visibility on product development, and, established key processes overall for better project estimation, planning and tracking to increase the predictability of projects and stabilize profitability to >= 50%
  • Helped plan a strategy for HR Recruitment & Retention with help of employee connects and innovative motivational tools
  • Coached a team of over 20 members, to develop an Enterprise Asset Management product, by adopting several Agile practices to a large extent (~60%)
  • Trained and Mentored team of 5 PMs in Microsoft Project and Primavera P6, to gear them up to handle PMO Services for their international clients

 

LEAN Coach & TRANSFORMATION ConsultantKINDUZ Consulting & OHA  May 2016 to Oct 2019

  • As an Ops head and LEAN Coach for a facility management team in India's western region, I coached all the leaders to execute focused improvement programs to increase customer retention and to increase the profitability of the region by 3% resulting in savings of almost Indian Rupees 0.5 million
  • Coached and mentored a team of over 50 people, consisting of CXOs and Senior Management, from all their Manufacturing plants in India. Identified and executed several Breakthrough (BIP) and Continuous improvement projects (CIP) to help optimize their India Operations and achieve savings of over USD 1 million within a year through Lean Six Sigma tools and processes. BIP and CIPs were targeted to address business processes, Sales, Training and IT departments
  • Trained and Mentored several Faculty & Students (freshers) , from over 100 different academic institutions in India, to make them Industry ready. Some modules covered were SDLC, Project management, Agile methodologies, customer service orientation, communication & presentation skills

 

Program / Delivery ManagerL&T Infotech, India & USA Feb 2000 to Oct 2015

  • Led a Strategic Global IT Transformation Program, for a large US client, to Rationalize their Application Portfolio across various departments and achieve a savings of over USD 80 million. It involved phase-wise strategy, program planning and implementation, stakeholder management, sunsetting / decommissioning / migration planning, Data Archival and Restoration for all their applications globally.
  • Helped design and execute a strategic PM excellence training and coaching program for over 150 PMs, to increase savings and revenue from existing projects to the turn of USD 1 million
  • Led an operations excellence initiative across various projects to target and achieve a 5% increase in gross margin from projects resulting in multi-million dollars of savings
  • Worked as a SCRUM Master and handled Product Visioning and Roadmap, Epic/Feature/Story mapping, Backlog prioritization and Estimating, Release and Sprint planning, Stakeholder Management, Risk Management to help implement a proof-of-concept for real-time tracking of Oil shipments
  • Was a Project Manager for several projects in Healthcare, Oil-n-Gas and Engineering domains 
  • Worked as a Training head to design and deliver various Technical, Functional and Behavioral trainings leveraging in-house experts, as well as top vendors and external trainers

 

Database Administrator and Software Engineer India and USA From Jul 1991 to Nov 1999

  • Worked for WALTECH Inc (USA) , AKSHAY Software (India) , BLUESTAR (India) , ASIAN EXPORTS (India)
  • Designed developed and supported various applications for Consumer Products, Device Manufacturer, Insurance and various Engineering customers from USA, UAE and India

 

 

Education

Bachelor of Engineering (B. E.) Comp Science, Shivaji University India, 1991

Adv Diploma in Business Administration, Wellingkars, Mumbai, India, 2018

 

 

Certifications

Certified Scrum Master, Agile Certified Professional (PMI-ACP) , Agile Team Facilitator and Agile Coach (iCAgile - ATF, ACC) , Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) 5.0, SAFe 5.0 Product Owner - Product Manager (SAFe POPM) , as well as ITIL-Foundation, Lean Six Sigma - Green Belt

 

Tools & Technologies
